author: Vexed (Vexed#3211
name: AnotherPingCog
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! This cog will replace the normal `ping` command.

This cog has docs! Check them out at https://vex-cogs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/cogs/anotherpingcog.html
description: Replace the ping command with a rich embed that shows ping time and message time. It is colour coded: red, orange and green.
short: Just another ping cog... But this one has fancy colours in an embed!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
